metadata.name: HackTool - Wmiexec Default Powershell Command
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of PowerShell with a specific flag sequence that is used by the Wmiexec script

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-nop -nol -sta -noni -w hidden -exec bypass -enc')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of PowerShell with a specific flag sequence that is used by the Wmiexec script
